Hotel.name: Residence Inn by Marriott Vancouver Downtown

Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Residence Inn by Marriott Vancouver Downtown places you in the heart of Vancouver, minutes from Vancouver International Film Centre and close to Granville Island Public Market. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Orpheum Theater and Robson Square.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 201 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while 42-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including an indoor pool, a spa tub, and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and ski storage.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café. Meet other guests and eat at a complimentary reception. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary full breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and a computer station. This hotel has 4 meeting rooms available for events. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café. Meet other guests and eat at a complimentary reception. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary full breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

The preferred airport for Residence Inn by Marriott Vancouver Downtown is Vancouver, BC (YVR-Vancouver Intl.) - 9.9 km / 6.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Cascadia Hotel & Suites is Vancouver, BC (YVR-Vancouver Intl.) - 9.9 km / 6.2 mi.

RoomType.text: Twin (Studio Suite King Studio 1 King City view)

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Please note: Please be advised that the pricing for this room type is for 2 adults only. For any additional guests, there is an extra person fee of 20 - 40 CAD per adult/night to be paid directly to the hotel on arrival. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
